properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen Bank National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 4:01AM EST until January 7 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
3 to 5 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen
Bank National Marine Sanctuary.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to noon EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST TUESDAY
